# Changelog

## 0.4 (September 13, 2018)

* README link fix.

## 0.4 (September 13, 2018)

* Fixed lack of complete context
* Added parsing of fields in flow blocks
* Added tests

## 0.2 (April 16, 2018)

Refactored to process content on build step to more avoid 'double processing' and more easily use Jinja raw tags.

## 0.1 (April 12, 2018)

Initial Release
